anime.description: * Based on the erotic visual novel developed and published by Light. As the Soviet Union marches on Berlin in May of 1945, a secretive group of sorcerers and madmen gathers to perform a terrible ritual. After the war, they vanish and are not heard from again, except in rumour. One day, it is whispered, they will return. And on that day, the world will end. Fear the demons in human form. Fear the Longinus Dreizehn Orden. Flash forward to present-day Japan. http://anidb.net/ch78967 [Fujii Ren] is released from the hospital after two months spent recovering from a vicious brawl with his best friend http://anidb.net/ch78968 [Yusa Shirou]. As Christmas approaches, he tries to rebuild his life, but even that is soon threatened, for the knights of the LDO have returned and brought the apocalypse to his doorstep. Forced to wield the same unholy power as his foes, will Ren be able to protect what is dear to him from the inhuman might of the Longinus Dreizehn Orden? Source: VNDB

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: erotic game
tag.description: An erotic game (eroge) is a Japanese video or computer game that features erotic content, usually in the form of anime-style artwork. In English, eroge are often called hentai games in keeping with the English slang definition of hentai. This is sometimes shortened to H games. In Japan, eroge are also referred to as 18+ games. Most erotic games are visual novels or dating sims but are not limited to them. Any anime adaptation of a game that contains (or had a version that contains) adult content (generally sex scenes), regardless of how some fanboys blabber on how "the story in that visual novel was too good to be labelled as porn!", should definitely get this category added under them. This should make it pretty clear as to what is an erotic game and what is not.

tag.name: visual novel
tag.description: The two terms are similar yet different, however, the fact that they look and `feel` the same outweighs the technical differences. For clarification, visual novels are considered a sub-genre of adventure games and the term does not cover simulations. While the two genres often share a common visual presentation, dating sims are sometimes considered to be more statistically based than the "choose your own adventure" style of visual novels; basically, the choices you make might change something else than just the story arc (or your next porn pic). Dating sims can involve several technical elements such as a time limit, several statistics such as looks and charm which can be boosted through exercise, or an "attraction meter" which can increase or decrease depending on one`s decisions.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: crowdfunded
tag.description: This anime was funded, at least partially, through a campaign on a crowdfunding website (e.g. Kickstarter, Makuake).

episode.title: 悪夢の終わりは始まり
The End of the Nightmare Is a Beginning
La fin du cauchemar marque le commencement
악몽의 끝은 시작
Akumu no Owari wa Hajimari
episode.summary: Ren confronts one of the group of new students about what they want. Ayane begins to show signs of supernatural abilities. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 獣の爪牙
The Claws and Fangs of a Beast
Les bec et ongles de la bête
짐승의 마수
Kemono no Souga
episode.summary: Each night, Ren is tormented by dreams. When he wakes up, another headless corpse is found. Is he behind the murders, and if so, why? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄昏の少女
Twilight Girl
La jeune fille au crépuscule
황혼의 소녀
Tasogare no Shojo
episode.summary: Fujii Ren is discharged from the hospital, not waiting for his friend Kasumi to meet him. She catches up with him and makes him take her to a sword exhibition to confront his fear of knives. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黎明
Episode 0: The Dawning Days
L’aurore
여명
Reimei
episode.summary: At the start of a great war, an important leader in the German security bureau takes on a mission to fight supernatural mutants himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Opening
自滅因子
Self-Destruction Factor
Le facteur d’auto-destruction
자멸인자
Jimetsu Inshi
episode.summary: Shirou speaks with the mastermind behind the events in the city, who reveals that he was manipulated into being immortal and becoming "a toy of God." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不死英雄[エインフェリア]
Einherjar
Le héros immortel
불사영웅[에인헤랴르]
Einherjar
episode.summary: Eleonore is planning on opening the Fifth Swastika, but Lisa and Ren are there to potentially try to stop her. However, Kei is following Eleonore`s orders, so that might not go as smoothly as everyone thinks. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 母の罪[アイ]
A Mother`s Sins
L`amour d`une mère
어머니의 죄[사랑]
Haha no Ai
episode.summary: The Black Round Table`s next target is the hospital where Kasumi is kept. Will Ren be able to protect her? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 約束
Promise
La promesse
약속
Yakusoku
episode.summary: The LDO puts its terrifying plan into place as they prepare to open the eight swastikas across the city. Can Ren and Shirou stop them? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スワスチカ
Swastika
Les svastikas
스와스티카
Swastika
episode.summary: Ren is captured by the Black Round Table. He learns who they are and what they want. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黄金の獣
Golden Beast
Le monstre d’or
황금의 짐승
Ougon no Kemono
episode.summary: Fujii battles the enemies on the bridge. He temporarily gains the upper hand, and then the terrifying Lord Heydrich appears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 再会
Reunion
Les retrouvailles
재회
Saikai
episode.summary: Ren wakes up with a blonde girl in his bed! He and Kasumi adopt her and take her around the city, buying her clothes and taking her shopping. Then he has a meeting with his old friend Shiro. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 蜘蛛
Spider
L’araignée
거미
Kumo
episode.summary: The plans of the Black Round Table are revealed as one of their members teaches Ren how to use his powers. He`s quickly given the chance to put his new strength to the test as another member kidnaps Kasumi! Source: crunchyroll
